verses.roman:
gopī-preme kare kṛṣṇa-mādhuryera puṣṭi
mādhurye bāḍhāya prema hañā mahā-tuṣṭi

synonyms: gopī-preme—the love of the gopīs; kare—does; kṛṣṇa-mādhuryera—of the sweetness of Lord Kṛṣṇa; puṣṭi—nourishment; mādhurye—the sweetness; bāḍhāya—causes to increase; prema—the love; hañā—being; mahā-tuṣṭi—greatly pleased.
translation: The love of the gopīs nourishes the sweetness of Lord Kṛṣṇa. That sweetness in turn increases their love, for they are greatly satisfied.
